WorkItem.Description:
Moonkin troubles with the Idol of the Lunar Eclipse
It *should* in theory be rating slightly above the Idol of Luna Fury, but it comes up on the table as a zero.
I've tried editing it with "Special Effects":
5 x 44 spell critical strike rating (15 sec Moonfire Tick)
5 x 44 spell critical strike rating (15 sec Insect Swarm Tick)
But it still comes up as a zero.
I can't find any documentation on the Item Editor so I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong?
Help / Fix plz?
Â 
So far it's been an awesome piece of code for gearing up my tree / moonkin druid. Would be a shame if it starts falling apart on the epic gear...
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Idol of the Lunar Eclipse stats

Comments.Message:
Try setting it to grant 44 Critical Strike Rating per dottick.
Don't choose Spell Critical Strike; plug in 44 critical strike rating under "Base Stats."

This worked for me. It is about 25 dps upgrade over the Triumph Idol.
